description:
Everything can be sorted out !

is a card sorting template including an engaging icebreaker designed to onboard even the most skeptical participants into this technique!


Icebreaker:

Start your next card sorting activity by asking your participants to sort out some the craziest products out there and help them understand that even the strangest things can be categorised, organised and labelled in a meaningful way!


Final card sorting board

After the quick and FUN! warm up, your participants will be ready to help you shape your product with the final card sorting activity.


Happy sorting!
